1. Install a text editor of your choice and learn hot keys for all of the following commands:

* save, save all open files
* open file
* undo/redo
* go to particular line of code
* highlight a word/the next word/the line
* highlight all instances of a word
* copy/cut/paste words/lines
* duplicate lines

2. Write a paragraph or two description of your workflow for the class project. Your description should include:

* a summary of what data will be used;
* what analyses will be performed on the data;
* what the output of the analysis will contain;
* software that you need to complete your workflow. 

3. Install the following software on your computer (all clickable links):

* [R version 4.0.2](https://cloud.r-project.org/)
* If you are a Windows user, install [Ubuntu for Windows](https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/p/ubuntu/9nblggh4msv6?activetab=pivot:overviewtab)
* Install [homebrew](https://brew.sh/)
* [Mac users, upgrade bash to the latest version and set it as default shell following instructions here](https://itnext.io/upgrading-bash-on-macos-7138bd1066ba)
